testcase.name: Importing functionality
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to Login page...........................................passed Given Login with Production Manager.........................................passed And Click on the SignIn button..............................................passed When user navigates to Revised Fabric Sheet.................................passed And click on Styles expansion...............................................passed And click on clear filter icon..............................................passed And Verify whether the user is able to Select an IPO from the Menu list.....passed Then Click on the Style ShowHide button for closing the menu list...........passed Then Verify the count of the Fabric records under the Fabric Details grid...passed And click on Add data button................................................passed Then Verify whether the Import popup window is opened when clicked on the Import Fabric Details button.passed And Click on Close button in the Import popup window........................passed Then Select the WithInIPO option in the Import window.......................passed And Verify whether Mandatory validation msg is displayed or not on Onclick the Import button without selecting any values.passed Then Verify whether the user is able to add the selected fabric on Importing.passed Then Select the OtherIPO option in the Import window........................passed And Verify whether Mandatory validation msg is displayed or not on Onclick the Import button without selecting any value.passed Then Verify whether the user is able to select an IPO in the dropdown or not.passed Then Verify whether the Select Fabric field is displayed or not.............passed Then Verify whether the user is able to add the selected fabric on Importing or not.passed Then Select the PDFDS option in the Import window...........................passed And Verify whether mandatory validation msg is displayed or not on Onclick the Import button without selecting any values.passed Then Verify whether the user is able to add the Selected Fabric on Importing.passed Then Verify whether the imported fabric is able to Submit to the Fabric Team or not.passed
